content.json: ## CloudLAPS Admin Dashboard #### CloudLAPS is a community developed solution, providing an end-to-end local administrator password solution (LAPS) for cloud managed devices This solution provides the functionality of rotating the password for a given local administrator account on trusted devices using Proactive Remediation in Microsoft Intune. A trusted device in this sense means a device that is managed by Intune and joined to the organizations Azure AD tenant. Documentation site - https://msendpointmgr.com/cloudlaps

content.query:
CloudLAPSClient_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *)
| union (CloudLAPSAudit_CL
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *))
| project Type,TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated asc

content.json:
## Log Analytics Integration

For full feature reporting both the AAD Sign In and Intune Device logs are required. Some elements of this report are limited.

links.linkLabel: Web Portal Geo Location Sign In

parameters.name: IntuneDeviceCount
parameters.description: This query is used to check availability of the Intune logs within the selected Log Analytics workspaces
parameters.query:
IntuneDevices
| where OS contains "Windows"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by DeviceId
| summarize dcount(DeviceId) by bin (TimeGenerated, 1d)
| project dcount_DeviceId

parameters.name: AADSignInLogCheck
parameters.description: This query is used to check the availability of Azure AD Sign In logs within the selected Log Analytics workspace queries
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by UserPrincipalName
| summarize dcount(UserPrincipalName) by bin (TimeGenerated, 1d)
| project dcount_UserPrincipalName

parameters.name: LogWorkspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where name contains "MSECloudLAPSWorkspace" and type == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| project id

parameters.name: DetailsWorkbook
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/workbooks"
| where properties.displayName has 'CloudLAPS-AdminDetails-Template'
| extend path = trim('[]', id)
| project path

content.json: ## Client Statistics This section uses the CloudLAPSClient_CL log to display the current CloudLAPS health and management statistics of Windows client devices in your organization. Please Note: - Client health Statistics are reported during proactive remediation schedules - By default clients rotate their password every 3 days

content.query:
CloudLAPSClient_CL 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SerialNumber_s
| summarize count()
| extend ['ClientState'] = "Unique Managed Devices"
content.title: Device Stats - {TimeRange}

content.query:
CloudLAPSClient_CL 
| where isnotempty(SerialNumber_s)
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by PasswordRotationResult_s
content.title: Password Rotation Stats  - {TimeRange}

content.query:
CloudLAPSClient_CL
| make-series Trend = dcount(SerialNumber_s) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
content.title: Managed Device Check-In Stats - {TimeRange}

content.query:
CloudLAPSClient_CL 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SerialNumber_s, AzureADDeviceId_g, Message
| project TimeGenerated, SerialNumber_s, Message, AzureADDeviceId_g
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Client Actions - Daily Summary

content.query:
let Data = IntuneDevices
| distinct SerialNumber, DeviceId;
CloudLAPSClient_CL 
| join kind=rightouter Data on $left.SerialNumber_s == $right.SerialNumber
| where isnotempty(SerialNumber_s)
| extend ResourceURL = strcat('https://endpoint.microsoft.com/#blade/Microsoft_Intune_Devices/DeviceSettingsBlade/overview/mdmDeviceId/',DeviceId)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SerialNumber, AzureADDeviceId_g, Message
| project TimeGenerated, SerialNumber, Message, AzureADDeviceId_g, Type, ResourceURL
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Client Actions - Daily Summary

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Click here to view device details in the Microsoft Endpoint Manager Admin Center

items.name: Client Health Details - Intune Link Enabled

content.json: ### CloudLAPS Portal Sign-In Information Below are details on web portal access for CloudLAPS admin password retreivals. Note: You should always ensure that your CloudLAPS web portal is secured by multifactor authentication, as accounts provide local administrative rights on your devices.

## Report Disabled

### Required Log Analytics Link 

CloudLAPS web portal sign in reports require access to read the Azure AD Sign-In logs. Please link the Log Analytics Workspace containing these logs, and ensure that users have sufficient permissions to read from the Sig-In log.

## Report Disabled

### Empty Sign-In data for given App Registration

CloudLAPS web portal sign in reports require at least one sign-in event to have occurred for the report to display data. There was no sign-in data available for the specified app registration '{AppRegistrationName}'.

content.query:
SigninLogs 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(180d) .. ago(0d))
| where AppDisplayName == "{AppRegistrationName}"
| extend Description = iif(ResultType == 0, "Success", "Failure")
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Description
content.title: Sign In Result

content.query:
SigninLogs 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(180d) .. ago(0d))
| where AppDisplayName == "{AppRegistrationName}"
| extend Description = iif(ResultType == 0, "Success", ResultDescription)
| extend UserURL = strcat('https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/UserDetailsMenuBlade/Profile/userId',UserId)
| extend IPLookupURL = strcat('https://whatismyipaddress.com/ip/',IPAddress)
| extend ResourceURL = strcat('https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_RegisteredApps/ApplicationMenuBlade/Overview/appId/',AppId)
| project
    ResultType,
    TimeGenerated,
    User = Identity,
    UserPrincipalName,
    Location = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion),
    City = tostring(LocationDetails.city),
    AppDisplayName,
    AppId,
    IPAddress,
    UserId,
    Description,
    UserURL,
    IPLookupURL,
    ResourceURL
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Sign In Details - Previous 180 Days

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Click here to look up the user details in Azure AD
Click here to view IP lookup information on this IP

content.json:
## Admin Password Requests

CloudLAPS maintains an audit record of all admin password retrievals performed through the web interface. These actions are logged in the CloudLAPSAudit_CL log

#### Below is a summary of actions within the time range specified ({TimeRange})

content.query:
CloudLAPSAudit_CL
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SerialNumber_s, UserPrincipalName_s
content.title: CloudLAPS Admin Password Retrieval - By Admin - {TimeRange}

content.query:
CloudLAPSAudit_CL
| join kind = leftouter IntuneDevices on $left.AzureADDeviceId_g == $right.ReferenceId
| extend ResourceURL = strcat('https://endpoint.microsoft.com/#blade/Microsoft_Intune_Devices/DeviceSettingsBlade/overview/mdmDeviceId/',DeviceId)
| extend ADJoinType = iif(isempty(JoinType), "Unknown", JoinType)
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName_s, ComputerName_s, UserName, Result_s, SerialNumber_s, DeviceId, ResourceURL, ADJoinType, ManagedBy, CompliantState
| summarize arg_max(UserPrincipalName_s, *) by SerialNumber_s,TimeGenerated 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: All Intune Active Devices - Password Requests

items.name: Admin Usage Grid - With Intune Link

content.query:
CloudLAPSAudit_CL
| summarize count() by TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName_s, SerialNumber_s, ComputerName_s, Action_s, Result_s
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: All Devices - Password Requests

items.name: Admin Usage Grid - No Intune Link

content.json:
## Device Search

Specify the serial number of the device you wish to return details on in the below text input field.

content.query:
CloudLAPSClient_CL 
| where SerialNumber_s == "{DeviceSerial}"
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by PasswordRotationResult_s

CloudLAPSClient_CL
| where SerialNumber_s == "{DeviceSerial}"
| project TimeGenerated, Message, PasswordRotationResult_s, AzureADDeviceId_g, Type
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Client Details

items.name: Client Health Details - Intune Link Enabled

content.json:
### CloudLAPS Geo Sign-In Information

Below are geo location details on web portal usage.

## Report Disabled

### Required Log Analytics Link 

CloudLAPS web portal sign in reports require access to read the Azure AD Sign-In logs. Please link the Log Analytics Workspace containing these logs, and ensure that users have sufficient permissions to read from the Sig-In log.

## Report Disabled

### Empty Sign-In data for given App Registration

CloudLAPS web portal sign in reports require at least one sign-in event to have occurred for the report to display data. There was no sign-in data available for the specified app registration '{AppRegistrationName}'.

items.name: Geo Sign In Log Warning - Copy

content.query:
SigninLogs 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(180d)..ago(0d))
| where AppDisplayName == "{AppRegistrationName}"
| summarize count() by User = UserPrincipalName, Location = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion), ResultType
content.title: Sign In Location Map

content.query:
SigninLogs 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(180d)..ago(0d))
| where AppDisplayName == "{AppRegistrationName}"
| summarize count() by IPAddress, Location = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| extend IPLookupURL = strcat('https://whatismyipaddress.com/ip/',IPAddress)
| extend Country = iif(Location == "", "Unknown", Location)
| top 10 by IPAddress
| project IPAddress, Country, count_
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Top IP Addresses

content.query:
SigninLogs 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(180d)..ago(0d))
| where AppDisplayName == "{AppRegistrationName}"
| extend Country = iif(Location == "", "Unknown", Location)
| summarize count() by Country
content.title: Top Sign-In Locations - Countries

content.query:
SigninLogs 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(180d)..ago(0d))
| where AppDisplayName == "{AppRegistrationName}"
| summarize count() by Cities = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
content.title: Top Sign-In Locations - Cities

items.name: Web Portal Geo Sign In Information
